result.purpose: Responsible for defining data structures and services related to user functionalities on a social media platform.
result.architecture: The folder follows a service-oriented architecture pattern, focusing on modularity and separation of concerns.

internal/infras/x/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for API responses including listings, errors, and pagination.

internal/infras/x/x_svc.go.purpose: Defines a service for interacting with user-related functionalities on a social media platform.
